title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.183 - Animals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.183 - Animals

State Regulations

Live animals, including birds and turtles, are to be excluded from food service operations. This exclusion does not apply to edible fish, crustacea, shellfish, or to fish in aquariums. Patrol dogs accompanying security police officers or guide dogs accompanying blind persons are permitted in the dining area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-1.183

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
